subject: Revised Guideline for Alignment & Land Acquisition plan (LAP) approval through Data Lake - reg.
text: HRay 774ty TTHrfqifeasru (7es 9RavT & TTArf 4AT4, 4RT HGFR) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) Knta 1d 3-5 & 6, Hzr-10, ERAT, # Faovht 110 075 6-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 /Phone 91-11-25074100 / 25074200 NHAI /Policy Guidelines /Land Acquisition /2025 Policy Circular No.7.1.82/2025 dated 24th January, 2025 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. NHAI/11013/LA/MeasurestoexpediateLACStage-Ilapproval/2023 (Comp. No. 208612)} Sub: Revised Guideline for Alignment & Land Acquisition plan (LAP) approval through Data Lake reg: Ref: : NHAI Policy Guideline No. 7.1.78 dated 03.11.2023 (ji) MoRTH O.M No. NH-14012/27/2014-PGM (Vol-IV) dated 20.09.2024 (iii) MoRTH SOP & Checklist dated 20.09.2024 Presently, according to NHAI Policy Guideline No. 7.1.78 dated 03rd November, 2023, the Land Acquisition Committee (LAC) used to consider the combined approval of Alignment and Land Acquisition Plans (LAP) for National Highways. However, the Ministry of Road Transport and Highways (MoRTH)_ through an O.M. dated September 20, 2024 has provided Guidelines for the approval of   Alignment for all National Highways and Expressways, including Greenfield Projects, Combinations of Greenfield and Brownfield Expansions [where re-alignment is Up to 10 km or 20% of the Project Length (whichever is lower)]: A detailed Standard Operating Procedure   (SOP) and Checklist for alignment approval for National Highways issued by MoRTH are enclosed. Alignment approval as per OM & Checklist of MoRTH are further elaborated in Annexure-| with suitable example: Therefore, henceforth, with the approval of the Competent Authority, a revised process for the approval of alignment and LAP is outlined as below: 1 . Following Process flow is to be followed for Alignment & LA Plan approval: (A) For Projects under Delegation of Committee in MoRTH: For Projects under Delegation of Committee in MoRTH [i.e_ for Greenfield Corridor /Project and Combination of Greenfield Plus Brownfield or Brownfield Expansion (re-alignment is more than 10 km or 20% of the Project length (whichever is lower)], the alignment approval will be processed in accordance with the MoRTH 0.M. and SOP dated 20.09.2024 (copy enclosed). (ii) The DPR Consultant is  required to submit three alignment options, considering feedback from   all Stakeholders: The PD should evaluate the  feasibility of all alignments   using the Gati Shakti Portal. This is essential to assess existing and proposed Infrastructure  Developments from other  Departments/ Ministries in the proposed   ROW/Vicinity. Subsequently, the RO/PD/Technical Division will finalize three   optimal alignments, after conducting a Field Visit and consulting with all Stakeholders. Out of these three options, the PIUIRO & Technical Division should recommend the most preferred alignment: (iii) Technical Division shall upload the proposal for Alignment approval including three alignment options on Alignment' form of Data Lake & shall forward the same to Ministry (BP & SP Cell) through concerned Member. Following the conclusion of the Meeting at the MoRTH, the Minutes of the Meeting (MoM) shall be uploaded o the Datalake for reference and record- keeping: Contd_ 21- 4379 NHAL 599
